sentence.Network_en: Edward came in like a country wind, obstreperously healthy, jovial, large and rather bald.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱德华象一阵乡野的风刮了进来, 带着顽强的健康, 快活, 奔放和相当的直率.

sentence.Network_en: Obstreperously, he demanded to get service.
sentence.Network_cn: 他吵闹着要求别人为他服务.

list.abs: obstreperous behaviour , children ., 难以管束的行为 , 儿童.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... oblique 倾斜的>笔直的 obstreperous 吵闹的, 暴乱的>遵守纪律的 obstructed 阻碍的>不阻塞的.
类比反义总结_GRE_电脑之家PChome.net ... obfuscate 使模糊 obstreperous 喧嚣的,任性的 paean 赞美诗.
